description: One of the largest stupas in Nepal, a UNESCO World Heritage Site with a serene atmosphere.
An ancient stupa with a panoramic view of Kathmandu Valley and inhabited by playful monkeys.
A sacred Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, known for its religious and cultural significance.
A historic square with ancient temples, palaces, and the living goddess Kumari.
A vibrant neighborhood known for its bustling streets, shops, restaurants, and nightlife.
A beautiful neo-classical garden with a peaceful environment, perfect for relaxation.
A hill station offering breathtaking views of the Himalayas, especially during sunrise and sunset.
A historic square with the ancient royal palace, museums, and artistic courtyards.
A traditional market area with a rich cultural atmosphere and a variety of goods.
A hill station with a cable car ride, offering panoramic views and recreational activities.
The residence of the living goddess Kumari, showcasing traditional Nepali architecture.
A well-preserved ancient square with historic temples, palaces, and intricate artwork.
A historic artificial pond with a central temple, surrounded by a peaceful garden.
A protected area offering hiking trails, diverse flora and fauna, and panoramic views.
A historic street known for its hippie culture in the 1960s, now with shops and cafes.
A traditional Newari village known for its preserved cultural heritage and mustard oil production.
A well-maintained square with ancient palaces, temples, and intricate woodwork.
A botanical garden with a diverse collection of plants and a peaceful setting.
A museum showcasing Nepal's rich cultural and historical artifacts.
A historical town with ancient temples, shrines, and traditional Newari architecture.
